summary: Based on the artwork of Kentarou Miura.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]NOTICE:[/size] I won't be coming around to check in on the mod, I hereby give permission to use or modify the mod as you see fit as long as credit is given.

Based on the artwork of Kentarou Miura.

The Dragonslayer sword mod used in the images:
[url=file.php?id=3143]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3143[/url]

Available for male character only.

...and some youtube videos.
[youtube]TdpqV7RPnTE[/youtube]
[youtube]1VeD8_9d0CM[/youtube]
[youtube]ADkn-hid2W0[/youtube]

[color=yellow][u]Installation:[/u][/color]
Extract everything into your Skyrim\data\ directory

The exact directory for nif files:
...data\meshes\Berserk\armor\blackswordsman\
The exact directory for textures:
...data\textures\Berserk\armor\blackswordsman\
Esp plugin:
...data\

Activate the Berserk Black Swordsman Armor.esp if you want to use the iron arm.
OR
Activate the Berserk Black Swordsman Armor - No Arm.esp for use with other gauntlets.

Activate one or the other. Do not activate both esp at the same time.

[color=yellow][u]How to get the armor:[/u][/color]
Craftable under Steel category.
Cape is craftable using 1 bear pelt at the tanning rack.
OR
Use console command:
help "black swordsman" to get the full item id and help "black cape" for the cape, then,
player.additem xxxxxx n -where "xxxxxx" is the item id and "n" is the item count.

item IDs: (xx = load order)
Cuirass: xx003887
Boots: xx003885
Cape: xx003886
Arm: xx003DF0

example: player.additem 01003887 1

[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
Special thanks to Eferas for support, testing, and the go to guy for everything Berserk
Thanks to Mr. Kentarou Miura for creating Berserk, its wonderful story, characters, and universe.
Big Thanks to everyone who develops and contributes to nifskope and niftools
Thanks to Bethesda for making great games
Thanks to everyone who enjoy the work and endorse it

[u]Tool Used:[/u]
3ds Max 2012
Zbrush 4
Adobe Photoshop CS5
Nifskope/Niftools
author: Zenl
